hero.subtitle: Your strategic partner in the Intelligence and Federal contracting space.

about.title: Specialized Federal Contracting & Consulting
about.lead_text: As a certified Service-Disabled Veteran-Owned Small Business (SDVOSB), we excel in business development, program management, and IT services.
about.body_text: With a commitment to integrity and excellence, we serve federal and industry clients, guiding them through the complexities of the contracting process. Our goal is to create strategic partnerships that lead to lasting success.

services.title: Business Development & Capture
services.description: Strategic growth through targeted capture management and proposal development tailored for federal acquisitions.
details: Full-Cycle Proposal Strategy & Color Team Reviews

services.title: Program & Operations Management
services.description: Comprehensive oversight and execution of complex programs, ensuring operational efficiency and mission success.

services.title: Marketing & Stakeholder Management
services.description: Building strong relationships and communicating value through effective stakeholder engagement and market positioning.

team.name: Damien
team.bio: Damien drives operational excellence and program success. With a robust foundation in project management within the Intelligence community, he ensures complex initiatives are delivered with precision, compliance, and strategic impact.

team.name: Courtney
team.bio: Courtney leads strategic communications and engagement efforts. She connects the mission to the market, building lasting relationships with stakeholders and conveying DPC's value through targeted marketing and brand management.

contact.title: Ready to Partner?
contact.description: Reach out to discuss how DPC Solutions can support your mission.
